Objective 
Position: Procurement & Materials 
Dynamic and Results-Driven Oil & Gas Professional | 20+ Years of Expertise in Procurement, Contracts, and 
Supply Chain Optimization 
 
With over two decades of proven experience in the oil and gas industry, I bring a strategic approach to 
procurement, contract management, purchasing supervision, and warehouse coordination. My expertise 
lies in streamlining supply chain operations, fostering strong vendor partnerships, and implementing cost-
control measures that enhance operational performance and align with organizational objectives. 
 
I specialize in optimizing procurement and materials management, aligning them with business goals to 
enhance efficiency and maximize value. My focus on excellence and delivering results makes me a valuable 
asset in supporting operations and driving success in the energy sector. 
 
Ready to bring my expertise to a forward-thinking organization and contribute to its growth and success.

Skills and Expertise 
• 
Procurement Leadership: Extensive experience managing both international and local 
procurement contracts, ensuring efficiency, compliance, and value creation.   
• 
Risk Management: Proven ability to analyze and mitigate financial, quality, and safety risks, 
safeguarding operational continuity and standards.   
• 
Inventory and Cost Optimization: Skilled in implementing strategies for inventory optimization and 
cost reduction to drive organizational profitability.   
• 
SAP Expertise: Advanced proficiency in SAP modules (procurement, materials, and financial), 
maximizing system utilization for streamlined operations.   
• 
Supplier Development: Adept at evaluating and developing suppliers with a strong focus on 
financial and quality performance metrics.   
• 
Strategic Planning: Expertise in planning procurement activities for both offshore and onshore 
operations, ensuring timely and cost-effective execution.   
• 
Contract Management: Deep knowledge of contract management, emphasizing compliance with 
regulations and alignment with organizational goals.   
• 
Team Training and Support: Experienced in training and mentoring teams on procurement systems 
and operational processes, fostering efficiency and collaboration.   
This diverse skill set positions me as a strategic asset, capable of delivering exceptional results in 
complex and fast-paced environments.
